Mac Wayne Official Site Preview

This is a preview guide for the Mac Wayne official website. Click the button below to open the site in a new window:

Open Site Preview
Note: We've temporarily disabled the custom cursor for easier navigation during the preview. This feature will be re-enabled for the production release.

Review Areas:

  • Background Image: Check that the background image is clearly visible with no grain or braille texture effect.
  • Navigation: Test the responsive menu and navigation links.
  • Content Sections: Review the layout and appearance of all content sections.
  • Album Showcase: Verify that album cards and hover effects work correctly.
  • Tour Dates: Check the appearance of the upcoming shows section.
  • Newsletter Form: Test the newsletter signup form layout.
